articles.title: More states to remove border National Guard due to Trump policy
articles.description: The governors of Maryland and Virginia have announced they will recall members of their state's National Guard from the U.S.-Mexico border and Delaware's governor is turning down a request. They join Massachusetts in disagreeing with a federal policy of separâ€¦

articles.title: Maryland, Virginia to remove border National Guard due to Trump policy
articles.description: The governors of Maryland and Virginia have announced they will recall members of their state's National Guard from the U.S.-Mexico border because they disagree with a federal policy of separating immigrant children from their families.
